**__High Enrage Telos (1k to 4k)__**
.tag:intro
.img:https://i.imgur.com/oNKbXti.png
.
> **__Introduction__**
This guide assumes VERY strong understanding of everything found in <#854168962140340224> and <#568252864170819605>.

An average kill at 2449% enrage is worth <:coins:698816156961603654> $data_pvme:Bosses!B514$ in uniques alone. This assumes an estimated orb price of <:coins:698816156961603654> $data_pvme:Bosses!F497$. Advanced players can get up to $data_pvme:Bosses!B518$ kph, earning <:coins:698816156961603654> $data_pvme:Bosses!C518$/hr.

.
**__Notable Enrage Checkpoints and Changes Past 999__**
⬥ **1000%** P4 one rock will fall, P5 multiple rocks will fall, immortality no longer works P5, and Telos will freedom stuns and binds with a 16 tick cooldown
⬥ **2000%** "So you think you can guard?" Achievement, aka Silver Warden
⬥ **2700%** Tendrils damage required caps at 30,000
⬥ **3300%** The first prayer drain on P3 will smite you from full unless Telos touches the beam.
⬥ **4000%** Hard enrage cap; "True Warden" achievement, aka Gold Warden

.
> **__Preset__**
.tag:preset
⬥ <:tectlegs:643849257962438656> with Turtling 4 <:turt4:712073737377284146> and Clear Headed 4 <:ch4:712073087864012840>
⬥ <:eofpurple:780401412936040478> with Guthix Staff <:gstaff:513203008608141314>
⬥ <:eofblack:780401412915855380> with Statius Warhammer <:swh:641670143197446182>
⬥ <:graspingpouchblack:892816436974735361> <:Bloodrune:536252658970001409> <:Astralrune:536252658961481769> <:Bodyrune:536252659301089280> <:Firerune:536252659850674186>
⬥ <:graspingpouchpink:892816437503221830> <:Deathrune:536252659586433024> <:Earthrune:536252659808731137> <:Lawrune:536252661406760970> <:Cosmicrune:536252659615924258>
⬥ <:graspingpouchblue:892816437406728252> <:Chaosrune:536252659422855188> <:Airrune:536252658986647589> <:Waterrune:536252660165115905> <:Soulrune:536252660333019136>
(Runes for <:bloodbarrage:537338981747261446> <:icebarrage:537340400185245701> <:incitefear:856635090783567902> <:exsanguinate:856635090745950258> <:smokecloud:856635090641879050> <:SBSLunars:565726489467682816> <:disrupt:535614336207552523> <:Veng:543478434953822208> with <:borrowedpower:657248051190300682> <:ent:567727987274022924>)
.
*Note: It is assumed that Elder Overload <:elderovlsalve:648976643687317532> and Weapon Poison+++ <:weppoison:689525476158472288> are applied at bank prior to every kill.*
.
.img:https://i.imgur.com/wPa8iBV.png
.

.
**__Relics__**
⬥ <:conservationofenergy:697808773711921195> **Conservation of Energy**
⬥ <:furyofthesmall:697808773917573233> **Fury of the Small**

.
> **__Prefight__**
.tag:rots
<:dummy:656844963522281473> <:nat:535541258131865633> → <:voke:535541259465392143> → <:anti:535541306475151390> → <:wrack:856662355952795658> + <:dummy:656844963522281473> diss → <:dbreath:535533833391702017> + <:devo:513190158728953857> → (wait 2 ticks) → <:surge:535533810004262912>

.
> **__Phase 1__**
<:Sunshine:583430011948630016> → <:bloodbarrage:537338981747261446> <:gconc:869285393223254107> → <:ingen:641339234111848463> <:swh:641670143197446182> <:eofspec:746403211908481184> → 2H <:comb:535533833098100745> → <:smokecloud:856635090641879050> <:freedom:535541258240786434> → <:icebarrage:537340400185245701> <:wrack:856662355952795658> → <:magmatempesttarget:924741973858996284> → <:bloodbarrage:537338981747261446> <:gconc:869285393223254107> → <:asphyx:535533833072672778> (3 hit) → <:wrack:856662355952795658> → <:bloodbarrage:537338981747261446> <:gconc:869285393223254107> → <:omni:535533809664262179> → <:tsunami:535533809995874304> → <:sonic:535533809924571136> + <:surge:535533810004262912> / <:bd:535532854281764884>

*Note: Must be north of <:Telos:513212949033123840> for <:omni:535533809664262179> <:tsunami:535533809995874304> to hit on tick.*

.
> **__Phase 2__**
<:bloodblitz:535616247807868938> → (wait 1t) → <:soa:869284271595069451> <:spec:537340400273195028> → <:gconc:869285393223254107> → <:dbreath:535533833391702017> → <:gstaff:513203008608141314> <:eofspec:746403211908481184> → <:wm:535533809978966037> → <:smoketendrils:536257336130404372> (switch to <:icebarrage:537340400185245701> for 1t then back to <:exsanguinate:856635090745950258>)

⬥ Depending on HP
    • <:sonic:535533809924571136> → <:surge:535533810004262912> + <:bd:535532854281764884>
    • <:asphyx:535533833072672778> (2 hit) → <:wrack:856662355952795658> + <:surge:535533810004262912> + <:bd:535532854281764884> → s<:comb:535533833098100745>
    • <:asphyx:535533833072672778> (3 hit) → <:wrack:856662355952795658> + <:surge:535533810004262912> + <:bd:535532854281764884>
    • <:asphyx:535533833072672778> (3 hit) → <:impact:535533809655873556> / <:deep:535533833139912724> → improvise

.
> **__Phase 3__**
<:bloodblitz:535616247807868938> <:corruptblast:513190159194259467> / <:sonic:535533809924571136> if <:soa:869284271595069451> <:spec:537340400273195028> active → <:meta:535533811304497183> <:adrenrenewal:736298121704767538> → <:bloodbarrage:537338981747261446> <:gconc:869285393223254107> → <:dbreath:535533833391702017> / <:wrackandruin:856662355912032256> → <:bloodbarrage:537338981747261446> <:comb:535533833098100745> + <:bd:535532854281764884> → <:wm:535533809978966037>

⬥ Depending on HP
    • (Below 210k) <:bloodbarrage:537338981747261446> <:asphyx:535533833072672778> → <:dbreath:535533833391702017> + <:surge:535533810004262912>
    • (Above 210k) <:bloodbarrage:537338981747261446> <:omni:535533809664262179> → <:dbreath:535533833391702017> + <:surge:535533810004262912>

.
> **__Phase 4__**
**__Drop__** (autocast <:incitefear:856635090783567902>)
⬥ **Fastest**
<:bloodblitz:535616247807868938> <:omni:535533809664262179> → <:gstaff:513203008608141314> <:eofspec:746403211908481184> → <:surge:535533810004262912> / <:bd:535532854281764884>

⬥ **Fast**
<:bloodblitz:535616247807868938> <:comb:535533833098100745> → <:icebarrage:537340400185245701> <:gconc:869285393223254107> → <:omni:535533809664262179> → <:swh:641670143197446182> <:eofspec:746403211908481184> → <:surge:535533810004262912> / <:bd:535532854281764884>

⬥ **Slow**
<:bloodblitz:535616247807868938> <:comb:535533833098100745> → <:icebarrage:537340400185245701> <:gconc:869285393223254107> → <:dbreath:535533833391702017> / <:asphyx:535533833072672778> (2 hit) → <:impact:535533809655873556> → <:swh:641670143197446182> <:eofspec:746403211908481184> → <:surge:535533810004262912> / <:bd:535532854281764884>

.
**__Font 1__**
<:divert:787904334377648130> / <:res:535541258844635148> → <:reflect:535541258786177064> → <:smokecloud:856635090641879050> <:Telos:513212949033123840> <:anti:535541306475151390> → <:prep:535541258546970624> → <:voke:535541259465392143> → Golems <:icebarrage:537340400185245701> <:dbreath:535533833391702017> → <:Telos:513212949033123840> <:deto:535533833358016512> → <:icebarrage:537340400185245701> <:deto:535533833358016512> <:gconc:869285393223254107> → <:asphyx:535533833072672778> (2 hit) <:gstaff:513203008608141314> <:eofspec:746403211908481184> + <:surge:535533810004262912> → <:gchain:787904334495088672> + <:surge:535533810004262912> into font 2.

.
**__Font 2__**
(tc) <:dbreath:535533833391702017> → <:devo:513190158728953857> → <:freedom:535541258240786434> → <:res:535541258844635148> → <:prep:535541258546970624> → <:icebarrage:537340400185245701> <:tsunami:535533809995874304> → <:Telos:513212949033123840> s<:omni:535533809664262179> → r<:omni:535533809664262179> <:wm:535533809978966037> / <:dbreath:535533833391702017> → <:gstaff:513203008608141314> <:eofspec:746403211908481184> → <:bd:535532854281764884> + <:surge:535533810004262912> to font 3.

.
**__Font 3__** (autocast <:exsanguinate:856635090745950258>)
(tc) <:gchain:787904334495088672> → <:reflect:535541258786177064> → <:anti:535541306475151390> → <:dbreath:535533833391702017> → <:icebarrage:537340400185245701> <:corruptblast:513190159194259467> → <:Telos:513212949033123840> <:magmatempesttarget:924741973858996284> → <:deto:535533833358016512> → <:icebarrage:537340400185245701> <:deto:535533833358016512> <:gconc:869285393223254107> → <:asphyx:535533833072672778> (2-3 hit) → <:wrack:856662355952795658>

.
> **__Phase 5__**
*Note: <:res:535541258844635148> + <:surge:535533810004262912> through <:Telos:513212949033123840> if back beam.*

**__Green/Black Golem__**
<:smokecloud:856635090641879050> <:soa:869284271595069451> <:spec:537340400273195028> → <:dbreath:535533833391702017> → <:res:535541258844635148> → <:reflect:535541258786177064> → <:revenge:535541259645878302> → <:meta:535533811304497183> <:vitality:654618235097972737> → <:gstaff:513203008608141314> <:eofspec:746403211908481184> → <:gconc:869285393223254107> → <:wm:535533809978966037> → <:cade:535541306353778689> → <:gconc:869285393223254107> → <:omni:535533809664262179> + <:surge:535533810004262912> → <:limitless:641339233638023179> <:asphyx:535533833072672778> (2 hit) → <:gconc:869285393223254107> → <:wrackandruin:856662355912032256> / <:tsunami:535533809995874304> / <:gstaff:513203008608141314> <:eofspec:746403211908481184>

.
**__Red Golem__**
<:smokecloud:856635090641879050> <:soa:869284271595069451> <:spec:537340400273195028> → <:dbreath:535533833391702017> → <:res:535541258844635148> → <:reflect:535541258786177064> → <:meta:535533811304497183> <:vitality:654618235097972737> → <:anti:535541306475151390> → <:revenge:535541259645878302> → <:gstaff:513203008608141314> <:eofspec:746403211908481184> → <:wm:535533809978966037> → <:cade:535541306353778689> → <:gconc:869285393223254107> → <:omni:535533809664262179> + <:surge:535533810004262912> → <:limitless:641339233638023179> <:asphyx:535533833072672778> (2 hit) → <:gconc:869285393223254107> → <:wrackandruin:856662355912032256> / <:tsunami:535533809995874304> / <:gstaff:513203008608141314> <:eofspec:746403211908481184>

.
